headline: Show HN: A meditative website where you look out of a window and draw auroras
description:
Thanks for checking out my project! I built this for myself to have something to play with for when I felt overwhelmed. It's designed to be active enough to be a distraction if you want, but also calming and predictable enough to be relaxing.

I built it on p5.js and Tone.js, and all of the settings UI is in Vue. These were technologies I've been wanting to dive into for a while, as someone who codes for a living but does a lot of music for fun. It's also designed to be a PWA, so it should work offline if you install it.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 一个冥想的网站，你看着窗外，画着极光
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 一個冥想的網站，你看著窗外，畫著極光
description_zh-Hans:
谢谢你检查我的项目! 我为自己做了这个，以便在我感到不知所措的时候有东西可以玩。它的设计足够活跃，如果你愿意，可以分散你的注意力，但也足够平静和可预测，可以让人放松。

我在p5.js和Tone.js上建立了它，所有的设置UI都在Vue中。作为一个以编程为生但又以音乐为乐的人，这些技术我已经想深入研究一段时间了。它也被设计成一个PWA，所以如果你安装它，它应该可以离线工作。
